definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: forget (NH id.; Sir 45:26 c and (Pi.) Sir 11:25, Sir 11:25; Aram. [[שְׁכַךְ]] 3kah. is find);—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: acc. rei Ge 27:45 (E), De 4:9, De 9:7 (opp. [[זׇכַר]]) +, = forget and leave, [[ב]] loc., De 24:19; c. obj. cl. c. [[בִּי]] Job 39:15; c. [[מִן]] inf. Ps 102:5.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: c. acc. pers., involving forgetting to mention, Ge 40:23 (E; opp. [[זכר]]), ceasing to care for Je 30:14 (fig.), Is 49:15, Is 49:15 (acc. om.), v:Is 49:15, Job 19:14, Ps 45:11; c. acc. Jerusalem Ps 137:5; [[יִשְׁכָּחֵהוּ רֶחֶם]] Job 24:20; abs. Ps 137:5 [[תּשְׁכַּח יְמִינִי]]: AE Ki supply [[הַמַּעֲשֶׂה]] or [[הַנִּגּוּן]] (whence AV her cunning), but forced: LXX [[תִּשָּׁכַח]]; read prob. (Gr Bu al.) [[תִּכְחַשׁ]] let it grow lean (Ps 109:24, cf. Zec 11:17), or (Che) [[תְּכַחַשׁ]] let it disappoint (me), fail (Hb Hab 3:17).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: esp. c. acc. ´[[י]]: (God), Ho 2:15, Ho 8:14, Ho 13:6, Ju Jdg 3:7, 1Sa 12:9, Is 17:10, De 8:19 (´[[שָׁכׂחַ תִּשׁ]]:) + 16 t. (5 t. Dt, 4 t. Je), + Ps 59:12 (acc. om.); also acc. of divine name Je 23:27 ([[בַּבַּעַל]]), Ps 44:21; commands of ´[[י]]: Ho 4:6, De 26:13 (acc. om.) Ps 119:16 + 7 t. Ps 119, his doings and ways, v:Ps 119:139, Ps 78:7, Ps 78:11, Ps 103:2, Ps 106:13, his covenant De 4:23, De 4:31, 2Ki 17:38, Pr 2:17; law of wisdom Pr 3:1, sc. acc. [[בִּינׇה]] Pr 4:6.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: acc. of sins Am 8:7, Ps 10:11 (acc. om.), cry Ps 9:13 (opp. [[זׇכַר]]), cf., of distress, Ps 44:25.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[נִשְׁכַּח]] Ec 9:5, etc.; Impf. [[יִשָּׁכַח]] Ps 9:19, 3 fs. [[תִּשָּׁכֵחַ]] Je 20:11, etc.; Pt. fs [[נִשְׁכָּחָה]] Is 23:16, [[נִשְׁכַּחַת]] v:Is 23:15, pl. [[נִשְׁכָּ חִים]] Job 28:4;—be forgotten: subj. rei Ge 41:30 (E), De 31:21, Je 20:11, Je 23:40, Je 50:5, Is 65:11; subj. pers. Ps 9:19, Ps 31:13, Ec 2:16, Tyre Is 23:15, Is 23:16 (under fig. of harlot), subj. [[זִכְרָם]] Ec 9:5; [[מִנִּי רָָגֶל]] ´[[הַנִּשׁ]]: Job 28:4. †

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[וגו]] :´[[שִׁכַּח י]]: La 2:6 ´[[י]]: hath caused to forget (be forgotten) in Zion assembly and sabbath. †

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Inf. [[לְהַשְׁכִּיחַ]] Je 23:27 to make my people forget my name (2 acc.). †

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Ipmf. 3 mpl. [[יִשְׁתַּכְּחוּ]] Ec 8:10 they were forgotten in the city.
